raw_body:
JAYASINGHE T.K. (TIKKA) – Rtd. Senior Superintendent of Police. Beloved husband of Indra,​ loving father of Kishani,​ Rajiva and Shalika (daughter-in-law). Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 8.30 a.m. onwards on 7th March 2024. Thereafter cortege leaves the Parlour on Thursday 7th March 2024 at 2.45 p.m. for Cremation at 3.30 p.m. at General Cemetery,​ Borella (New Crematorium).
016424
